channel.title: Annoying Battlescape combat Problem (ONLY unperfect thing about the combat) :S
channel.description:
When your fighting a monster, say I use a Melee weapon, I click on the monster and while its walking to the monster you change your mind and decide your going to use range, so you click on your range weapon although it doesnt switch weapons until you hit the monster or you click away.
So basically you cant switch from any weapon to any weapon unless the current weapon your using hits the monster first.. Ive had this problem on 3 different Battlescape bases I have..
Any Ideas?

item.title: Annoying Battlescape combat Problem (ONLY unperfect thing about the combat) :S
item.dc:creator: @Nou Nou
item.description:
@Nou wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:8, topic:337402”]resetattack()
resetatk()
resetattk()

its one of those voids in battlescape that resets the combat sequence. just make it so when you change a wep you call that void.[/quote]Ok, I knew I had to use that, but where do I add that? Somewhere that has to do with switching items right? what do i Ctrl+f for?

Read full topic

resetattack()
resetatk()
resetattk()

its one of those voids in battlescape that resets the combat sequence. just make it so when you change a wep you call that void.

item.title: Annoying Battlescape combat Problem (ONLY unperfect thing about the combat) :S
item.dc:creator: @Nou Nou
item.description:
@Nou wrote:

[quote=“x pk3r xx, post:6, topic:337402”][quote author=Nou link=topic=433804.msg3185310#msg3185310 date=1271676256]

im not that good either.

when you click on the monster it start the action to attack it, when clicking another weapon it should stop the action of attacking the monster to switch weapons. it seems like you just need to figure what to put in to make the action stop when clicking another weapon.
[/quote]I think your making a point here, Ill search around in my source to find it. Lets put our noob power together to get the answer.

lol sure, just post here when you find anything and ill see if i can make anything up[/quote]Idk ill try Ctrl + F’ing “attack”…

Read full topic
